stimulusHtml: Which of the following could describe the appearance of the data in the semi-log plot?

features.html: A data set that appears exponential is modeled by the function  k  given by kt=7Â·5t. The data are represented using a semi-log plot, where the vertical axis is logarithmically scaled with the natural logarithm.

choicesHtml: The data appear linear with a slope of 5.
The data appear linear with a slope of ln5.
The data appear as an exponential curve that is concave up.
The data appear as an exponential curve that is concave down.
